name: COMA (KK)
description:
Coma Made for Global Game Jam 2021 All code and assets were developed within the 48 hours. The theme is Lost & Found. Summary:

We imagine that the coma process of the vegetative state is dreaming repeatedly.

Player plays a role of conscious to find self on dream scenario.

Finally we hope they would wake up and reunite with their family.

Controls:
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Maybe you will need LMB on ending UI.
Credits: 

Cool guys, I love you.

Cliff  (Programmer)
